description.narrative: Resilience through Economic Empowerment Climate Adaptation Leadership and Learning (REE -CALL) 2021 will cover 89000 direct participants and 285000 indirect beneficiaries in 14 districts of Char, Haor and Coastal areas for enhancing resilience through economic empowerment and women leadership, climate action Disaster Risk Reduction (DRR) and resilience WASH, active citizenship and influencing at local to national. Project will be implemented by Community Based Approach and local to national level influencing. 14 Partner Non Governmental Organisations (PNGOs) will implement the project and influencing and knowledge partners will provide necessary support. Private sector engagement also a key strategy of the project.

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

sector.narrative: Right to Equity: Gender and Diversity
